item.description: Well, we would definitely have no problem with that! We could put something up on blog linking back also.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description:
Caelan gave a great presentation.
I've been hesitant to publish the names of all the attending companies without getting their permission first, hence the abbreviated list.
item.content:encoded:
Caelan gave a great presentation.

I’ve been hesitant to publish the names of all the attending companies without getting their permission first, hence the abbreviated list.

item.title: By: Aoife Murray
item.dc:creator: Aoife Murray
item.description: Our CEO, Caelen King attended and found it very useful indeed. The networking session afterwards is a great idea as if gives attendees a chance to hang out in a more relaxed way.
item.content:encoded: Our CEO, Caelen King attended and found it very useful indeed. The networking session afterwards is a great idea as if gives attendees a chance to hang out in a more relaxed way.
